Question & Options:
Which movies did Jeet Gannguli contribute to as a composer?
Options:
A. Bhaiaji Superhit
B. Jalebi
C. Raaz: Reboot
D. Kedarnath

Which of the following statements are true regarding Raghav Sachar's work?
Options:
A. a) Raghav Sachar composed songs for Bhaiaji Superhit.
B. b) Raghav Sachar worked on the soundtrack of Helicopter Eela.
C. c) Raghav Sachar is known for his work in both Bhaiaji Superhit and Helicopter Eela.
D. d) Raghav Sachar directed Bhaiaji Superhit.
Correct Answer: a) Raghav Sachar composed songs for Bhaiaji Superhit. & b) Raghav Sachar worked on the soundtrack of Helicopter Eela.

Question & Options:
Which movies did Raghav Sachar contribute music to?
Options:
A. Amavas
B. Helicopter Eela
C. Raaz
D. Bajrangi Bhaijaan

Which of the following statements are true regarding the music duo Sanjeev-Darshan and their work?
Options:
A. a) Sanjeev-Darshan composed songs for Bhaiaji Superhit.
B. b) Sanjeev-Darshan have worked on the soundtrack of Yamla Pagla Deewana: Phir Se.
C. c) Sanjeev-Darshan is known for their work in Bollywood soundtracks.
D. d) Sanjeev-Darshan has collaborated with various artists in the industry.
Correct Answer: a) Sanjeev-Darshan composed songs for Bhaiaji Superhit. and b) Sanjeev-Darshan have worked on the soundtrack of Yamla Pagla Deewana: Phir Se.

Question & Options:
Which of the following statements is true regarding the songs 'sleepy sleepy akhiyan' and 'do naina'?
Options:
A. a) 'sleepy sleepy akhiyan' is from the movie Bhaiaji Superhit.
B. b) 'do naina' is a song from the movie Amavas.
C. c) Both songs have lyrics written by Amjad Nadeem.
D. d) 'do naina (shafqat version)' is sung by Aakanksha Sharma.
Correct Answer: a) 'sleepy sleepy akhiyan' is from the movie Bhaiaji Superhit.

Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the songs 'Om Namah Shivay' and 'Do Naina'?
Options:
A. a) Both songs have lyrics written by Amjad Nadeem.
B. b) 'Do Naina' has a version sung by Shafqat Amanat Ali Khan.
C. c) 'Do Naina' (Shafqat version) is sung by Aakanksha Sharma.
D. d) Both versions of 'Do Naina' have lyrics written by Amjad Nadeem.
Correct Answer: a) Both songs have lyrics written by Amjad Nadeem.
